game.name: Sofia And Pet
game.description:
Oh, how much dirt is accumulated on the body of a cute rabbit that Sofia carries! Sofia has plenty of tasks to complete during day. So, she needs your support in cleaning her pet. We hope that you would not able to say no to this pretty girl. If so, join Sofia and Pet and be prepared to allow her rabbit to have a cool bath. Remember, you also have to help the girl to pick up an awesome dress for her pet. 

Your proper guidance will help her to take care of her bunny in a friendly environment in this one of the best animal games. Give her a pet a proper shower with the help of products that you see on the right side of the screen! You will be regularly guided by the instructions flashed on the screen from time to time. Once you give the rabbit a shower, make sure to wipe her up using a towel with soft hands. 

After providing her a proper bath, you can change her skin and go through a wider collection of clothes to finalize the right outfit for her. Do not delay anymore as Sofia is waiting for her bunny outside. Dress her up fast to allow Sofia to enjoy a wonderful day ahead! We hope that you would have huge fun in our cute makeover games for kids. Play our kids games on mobile phones, computers and iPads or iPhones, no download required!
